sources.snippet: William D. Quarles, Jr. United States District Judge. MEMORANDUM OPINION . William Parker sued Ciena Corporation ("Ciena") and Mark Gorman (collectively, "the Defendants") for employment discrimination and retaliation in violation of Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 ("Title VII") and state law claims. Pending is the Defendants' motion to dismiss the complaint for failure to state a claim.
